lines.text: Well... it ain't been over two weeks ago since I read this article in some magazine.
What was this article on?
Intelligence?

And this article tells how these guys in G2, no matter what is their actual rank, can go around posin' as anything they want. A private in G2 can put on a general's uniform, or a general in G2 can put on a private's uniform, or anything in between.
Which do you think it is in this case?
Well... if a man is a private and he has the chance to be anything he wants, would you suppose he would go right on pretending to be a private?

Nosiree, boy. 'Cause any ordinary dogface knows what they can expect out of life... as an ordinary dogface... Nothin'! Stanley, Stanley, for the first time, I think I see what you mean. If they ain't privates masquerading as privates, then they gotta be something else masquerading as privates!
Would our colonel be so free with his car and women unless he's ranked and feels that he ain't got no choice except to grin and shut up?
Private Archie Hall is a general in G2!
...The point I'm trying to make is about the handicap I'm under in my relation to girls.
What handicap?
My natural honesty, my basic decency, my over-developed sense of what is right and what's wrong.
I could see where those things would be a handicap. I mean, even if you can't lie to a girl... even just a little?
...What were we talking about?
Will I see you tomorrow?
Well, of course, like any soldier, I have my duties to perform.
Shall I pick you up here or in town?
Here, if you don't mind. That bus ride into town is strictly for the rookies.
And that was when the Vigaro hit the Mixmaster.
No luck huh?
Oh this goes way, way beyond luck, buddy. I think we may have finally reached the point where we're operating in the realm of the supernatural.
Have you seen the newsreel shots of those English glider invasions? The whole idea seems to be to try and crash through as many fences as you can before you burst into flames.
And maybe you haven't given any thought to how much you are a sitting duck in one of those things.
Aw, now, what is a sitting duck but a duck that just happens to be sitting?

[Sarcastically]
"What is a DEAD duck but a duck that just happens to be DEAD?"
Were you as shocked as I was about the fuss all those guys put up about us getting passes?

It wasn't that so much as it was that we were the only two in our barracks not on that KP list. Several of them were muttering something about "those two no-good duty sergeant-bribing gold-bricks who better not show their faces around there again."
Well, what makes them think it's such a treat for US to show THEM our faces?
